name: Pulsemon
effect: [On Play] You may trash cards from the top of your security stack until there are 3 left; gain 1 memory for each security card trashed.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While you have 3 security cards, this Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞. (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)
